name: Time Traveler (BAVC Next-Gen)
description:
Join time traveler Aile from 2104, going back into time to 2019 to explore the beautiful, eye catching and unpredictable city of San Francisco. Meet locals and witness amazing scenes of the prominent city. Meeting people ranging from teenagers to grandparents, and students to scammers. Gain bonds, perspectives, and leave with lasting interactions.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move
Space Bar to jump
X key for dialogue

Created by Christina Chan, 2021

This semester in Game Code Design students worked on portraying themes of mental wellbeing and exploration by developing a simple 2D side scroller game set in San Francisco. As their player will move through the city, they’ll stop to engage in playful dialogue with other characters.
